code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import CardsSeries from"./CardsSeries";import axios from"axios";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SeriesTendances=()=>{const[data,setData]=useState([]);const[scrollPosition,setScrollPosition]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("https://api.themoviedb.org/3/trending/tv/day?api_key=864b6602f4018630491e67fa714381e6&page=1&language=fr-FR").then(res=>setData(res.data.results));},[data]);const handleScroll=direction=>{const container=document.getElementById("movie-tendance-cards");const scrollAmount=200;if(direction==="left"){container.scrollLeft-=scrollAmount;setScrollPosition(container.scrollLeft);}else{container.scrollLeft+=scrollAmount;setScrollPosition(container.scrollLeft);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-tendance-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"choice"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movie-tendance-cards",id:"movie-tendance-cards",children:data.filter(movie=>{if(movie.media_type==="tv"){return movie;}else{return null;}}).map((movie,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/SeriesPopulaires/".concat(movie.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardsSeries,{movie:movie},index)}))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"prev",onClick:()=>handleScroll("left"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-angle-left"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"next",onClick:()=>handleScroll("right"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-angle-right"})})]});};export default SeriesTendances;
